price: 8. Waxaa arrinkaa ku sugan calaamo, mase aha badankoodu kuwo rumeyn.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
